channel.title: SFoL 45.5: RotBD III - Cancelled
channel.description:
## Welcome to RotBD 45. The first not Xed SFoL hosted by Pug and cohosted by @Insanity
### [Classcards (please read as there have been quite a few changes)](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-rotbd-rework-by-an-idiot-who-makes-unbalanced-gamemodes/66438)
## The Blue Dragon's factioncap is 4.
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 3 days/72 hours long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 day/24 hours long Actions are done by messaging me The Blue Dragon will speak through a PM The Dead and the Soulcatcher will speak through a PM When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial. Everyone will then vote Guilty or innocent in the thread. At any time in the trial phase. The King may use decide fate, If majority is reached on execute. The player will be killed and the day will end. If pardon is reached on the execution Executions end the Day #### I really badly did want to remove trials but Marl felt like I shouldn't have due to it being too much.
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: **[color=purple]Corrupted King - 65%[/color] / [color=steblue]Righteous King - 35%[/color]** **[color=steblue]Negotiator[/color]** **[color=steblue]Insurgent[/color]** **[color=purple]Kidnapper[/color]** **[color=purple]Marshal[/color]** **[color=purple]Unseen Support[/color]** **[color=purple]Unseen Investigator[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] / [color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]** **[color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] / [color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]**
### Living Players: 1. ~~Alice~~ -> **Firekitten** :crown: 1. **techwolves** 2. **WazzaAzza** 3. **bazinga** 6. ~~Luxy~~ -> **Meteoro** 7. **Soulshade** 8. **PKR** 10. ~~Geyde~~ -> **BlueStorm** 11. ~~Squid~~ - > **MathBlade** 13. **Sam17z** 14. **Solic** 16. ~~Marl~~ -> **astand**
### Graveyard: **Maxi - Died Night 1 - [color=purple]The Herbalist[/color]** **Margaret - Died Night 1 - [color=steblue]The Insurgent[/color]** **Frostwolf - Lynched Day 2 - [color=orange]The Demon[/color]** **Hjasik - Died Night 2 - [color=purple]The Nightwatch[/color]**
### Backups:
### Spectators
### Timestamps: [Day 2 - Gottem :ok_hand:](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-45-5-rotbd-iii-night-1-oops/75084/170) [Night 2 - Kids Like You](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-45-5-rotbd-iii-night-2-kids-like-you/75084/1345?u=pug) [Day 3 - He cannot perve anymore](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-45-5-rotbd-iii-day-3-he-cannot-perve-anymore/75084/1348?u=pug)

item.title: SFoL 45.5: RotBD III - Cancelled
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Sam17z:

You are a pretender right?

And your job is to become king which entails killing the king right?

But this king could be town king?

Isn’t it true that you could be killing a town king for the purpose of your selfish neut reasons and your selfish winning purposes even if it impeded on town’s chances of winning?

Isn’t it a fact that you aren’t always pro- town because you really don’t know whether the king is good or evil but has a 65% chance of siding with town?

And isn’t it is more likely it would side with town than scum?

@techwolves read this and answer them truth. Then respond to me

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL 45.5: RotBD III - Cancelled
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
You claimed that the enforcer was a jerk right?

But if I cs’ed a merc claim you would say that too right?

Isn’t it true this mercenary claim (pkr) was actually sellsword?

And isn’t it true sellsword is against town right?

So it would have been in MY best interest to get all the merc claim out correct?

And scum could also fake claim neuts too because there is room right?

So why would I take the chance allowing a scum neut / scum team member live for the price of a neutral I don’t care about when my defend would only kill me?

Side note:

Fool claim flipped demon right?

Isn’t it true the NK could have claimed a neut role and bypassed bd right?

Side Note II:

You are a pretender right?

And your job is to become king which entails killing the king right?

But this king could be town king?

Isn’t it true that you could be killing a town king for the purpose of your selfish neut reasons and your selfish winning purposes even if it impeded on town’s chances of winning?

Isn’t it a fact that you aren’t always pro- town because you really don’t know whether the king is good or evil but has a 65% chance of siding with town?

And isn’t it is more likely it would side with town than scum?

I think my cs’s were justified and I do not regret my actions. I play to ensure my I win. Tbh idc if anyone else wins besides me. So “defeat any neutrals who stand in your way” if I think you stand in my way I should defeat you correct?

I think you are wrong. From a townie POV I did the right thing. So…

Read full topic
